recommendations.excerpt: Soothe your stomach with these tips.

recommendations.title: How a Dose of MDMA Transformed a White Supremacist

recommendations.title: Giant, Mysterious Spires Ruled the Earth Long Before Trees Did. What Exactly Are These Odd-Looking Fossils?
recommendations.excerpt: For more than 150 years, scientists have debated whether Prototaxites—which stood roughly 24 feet tall and 3 feet wide—were an early lichen or fungus, like a “giant mushroom”

recommendations.title: Subaru Security Flaws Exposed Its System for Tracking Millions of Cars
recommendations.excerpt: Now-fixed web bugs allowed hackers to remotely unlock and start millions of Subarus. More disturbingly, they could also access at least a year of cars’ location histories—and Subaru employees still can.

recommendations.title: ‘You’re Playing With One of Our Biggest Wars’: Why Some Mexican People Are Upset About Oscar-Tipped Film Emilia Pérez
recommendations.excerpt: French director Jacques Audiard’s musical Emilia Pérez, about a Mexican drug lord, is a frontrunner for the Academy Awards. But its depiction of the country is stoking criticism.

recommendations.title: The Simple Dutch Cure for Stress
recommendations.excerpt: “Uitwaaien” is a popular activity around Amsterdam.

recommendations.title: An American Tragedy: The Colorful Life and Shocking Death of Ovid Neal III

recommendations.excerpt: The easiest method for perfect results every time.

recommendations.title: The US Has Bird Flu Vaccines. Here’s Why You Can’t Get One
